text: Peter Schulz (25 April 1930 – 17 May 2013) was a German politician, member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD) and First Mayor of Hamburg (1971 – 1974). Schulz was born in Rostock. He studied law at the University of Hamburg and after his graduation in 1958 Schulz founded his own office. Schulz died on 17 May 2013 in Hamburg, Germany, aged 83.Bürgerschaft und Senat trauern um Peter Schulz - Stadt Hamburg ==References== ==Other websites== *Schulz Noack Bärwinkel – Lawyers office homepage Category:1930 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Mayors of Hamburg Category:People from Rostock Category:Politicians from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Peter Schulz
